activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11079
activity.text:
@rithviknishad, I would like to work on this issue and here's how I would go about solving this issue:
## Implementation Steps:

#### 1. Identify the Breadcrumb Structure:
- For locations, the breadcrumb follows: Home > Building 1 > Floor 1
- For organizations, it could be: Home > State (Kerala) > Organization Name or something similar.

#### 2. Modify the Breadcrumb Component:
- Reuse and make the necessary changes in the existing Breadcrumb component.

#### 3. Update the Organization View:
- Fetch the necessary hierarchy details (e.g., state name, organization name).
- Pass these details to the breadcrumb component.

#### 4. Ensure Navigation Works:
- Clicking on a breadcrumb should navigate to the respective level.

Expected Timeline:
- Complete Implementation and submission of pull request: 1-2 days, before 8th March.
